～Android 13 での改善点・変更点～
・初回通知に通知権限をリクエストするように変更
・アプリ別に言語設定を行えるように変更（JP,EN）
・予測型「戻る」ジェスチャーに対応
・日本語の折り返しが自然となるように改善
・WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE権限を廃止し、READ_MEDIA_AUDIO権限に移行
logEn:
・Fixed a problem in which the music analysis is performed again for a song that has already been analyzed
・Fixed a problem in which the "Rescan Songs" dialog box could not be closed
・Fixed a problem in which billing information was not reflected in rare cases
・Fixed a layout issue with the light theme
・Adjusted sensitivity of menu when swiping horizontally
・Improved error message when purchase status fails to be confirmed
・Preparation for major layout changes in the next version
・Supported Android T (API33)

~ Improvements and changes in Android 13 ~
・Changed to request notification permission for the first notification
・Changed so that language settings can be configured for each app (JP,EN)
・Support for predictive "back" gesture
・Improved Japanese wrapping to be more natural
・WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE authority has been removed and moved to READ_MEDIA_AUDIO authority
